text: Boris Yakovlevich Podolsky (; 29 June 1896 â€“ 28 November 1966) was a Russian- American physicist of Russian Jewish descent. He was known for his work with Albert Einstein and Nathan Rosen on entangled wave functions and the EPR paradox.
